answers.text: It is none of your business what my lady is doing.
Uhm..She is doing fine I guess
She is doing lovely thanks for asking.
He.. uhm.. I wish the prince would take over already.
He does his best.
Our King is a paragon of justice that rules fair and just
I Saw him fight in the Old War once
I.. I don’t really like him, His beard annoys me
He and I were in school together!
That’s none of your business!
Why.. do you care?
15 years my friend
No, It’s the adventuring life for me
Yes.. One boy and a Girl
Yes and my boy will be the greatest Knight in the lands
There is no such thing, Don’t spread lies
I have heard of it, But getting in is the hard part
I.. I have heard of it and it was quite large inside lots of valuables
I have fought and nearly died to that creature
That’s way too dangerous. I wouldn’t dare to go near it
It is my nemesis and I will see him defeated
I am scared of no invader and will defeat the enemy
I hope they will just stay there, I’m in no mood for a war
That just means more work for us
I wouldn’t even know what to say to her
I bet she is really powerfull
Alas, I have a new quest
I Don’t like horses they make too much noise
She is a trusty girl
My horse Is only the strongest thoroughbred horse that money can buy
Tavern girls don’t interest me, I need a hero like me
I am a married man Innkeep, I have no eyes for her
What!... Who.. Yeah she is beautiful
Yeah.. I hate it. Im not a fan of the dark
The dark does not instill fear in me
Things that bump in the night are my quarry forever
Tattoos are for criminals but they suit you
Uh.. They’re cool I guess.
They’re cool what do you think of mine?
No stop playing these games.
I’d rather not I’d have to talk to so many people.
Yes, And I require your strongest potion
You have to make money somehow
It is what my family does.
It is my destiny!
Do not speak of this imposter, The one true god is M’Coville
I have heard of him, A great mind
I am already a devout believer
I will never join them too much attention
Not anymore friend.
I was born to lead them
Dragons should roam free as long as they don’t harm anyone
I already have three, My daddy bought them for me
I could always use a new friend.
Those knife-ears? I’d rather not.
I Don’t think I’d like it there very much. A place where the forest itself fights back no thank you.
Yes, They speak this very weird flowy language
Who? Like I’d concern myself with peasants
No, Who?... Doesn’t ring a bell
Yeah, he’s the one that robbed a conclave of chromatic dragons.
